tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CopyrightInfringement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_title VARCHAR(255),
    copyright_owner VARCHAR(255),
    infringement_type VARCHAR(50),
    infringement_detected_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE InfringementReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  entity_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES MediaEntities(entity_id)
);
CREATE TABLE MediaCompanies ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, company_name VARCHAR(255), headquarters_location VARCHAR(255), contact_person VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE MediaAssets ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, asset_name VARCHAR(255), media_type VARCHAR(50), created_date DATE, media_company_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (media_company_id) REFERENCES MediaCompanies(id) );

CREATE TABLE CopyrightInfringements ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, infringement_date DATE, infringing_media_id INT, original_media_id INT, perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (infringing_media_id) REFERENCES MediaAssets(id), FOREIGN KEY (original_media_id) REFERENCES MediaAssets(id) );

CREATE TABLE infringement_cases (
    case_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    case_description TEXT,
    infringement_date DATE,
    case_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE copyrighted_content (
    content_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(100),
    content_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE infringement_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT REFERENCES infringement_cases(case_id),
    report_date DATE,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE enforcement_actions (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT REFERENCES infringement_cases(case_id),
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_date DATE,
    action_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MediaAssets (
  asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  owner_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES MediaOwners(id)
);

CREATE TABLE CopyrightClaims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_description TEXT,
  asset_id INT,
  claimant_name VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES MediaAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  claim_id INT,
  report_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES CopyrightClaims(claim_id)
);
